author: Simon Difford
description: Tastes like its namesake - hard to believe the recipe comprises almost half apple juice.
name: Satsuma Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
52.5 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
